channel.title: How to remove Free Quests
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/6z4gtd.jpg[/img]
Cant tell if server or client sided. If you know please let me know!

item.title: How to remove Free Quests
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

I don’t know if you’ve found the id but I have a text file numbering them. The text is on line 663 or 640.

Read full topic

item.title: How to remove Free Quests
item.dc:creator: @I_Smoke_Kush I Smoke Kush
item.description:
@I_Smoke_Kush wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:9, topic:546201”][quote author=I Smoke Kush link=topic=665098.msg4446232#msg4446232 date=1408945142]

if(command.equals("loop")) { for(int i = 1; i < 25000; i++) { player.sendString(i, "LINE: " + i); } }

Sorry, I really dont know much about clients as much I do to servers, can anyone help me?

skype : eddie.samoylik

^Go through 1-25k and see if the line is in there.
restart the client after to fix all the strings.

nope

Did you execute the command?

I could’nt even find this command…
[/quote]

His code is to add a command that does what you want it to do. You would have to write the command yourself, because different bases handle commands differently.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: How to remove Free Quests
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“I Smoke Kush, post:8, topic:546201”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=665098.msg4446227#msg4446227 date=1408944677]

if(command.equals("loop")) { for(int i = 1; i < 25000; i++) { player.sendString(i, "LINE: " + i); } }

^Go through 1-25k and see if the line is in there.
restart the client after to fix all the strings.

nope

Did you execute the command?
[/quote]

I could’nt even find this command…[/quote]

His code is to add a command that does what you want it to do. You would have to write the command yourself, because different bases handle commands differently.

Read full topic

item.title: How to remove Free Quests
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

The string id is somewhere in the 600’s im pretty sure. Try looping through lines 600-700 do that by making a command.

if(command.equals("loop")) { for(int i = 600; i < 700; i++) { player.sendString(i, "LINE: " + i); } }

Read full topic
